Machine_Gun.skillDesc: Shot <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> machine gun bullet to enemy deal <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage each <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s).

Shotgun.skillDesc: Shot <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> machine gun bullet to enemy deal <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage each <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s).

Flame_Arrow.skillDesc: Firing <color=#00FF00>{2}</color>  piercing arrows at enemies every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color>  second(s), each arrow deals <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage and leaves a trail of fire for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> second(s), burning enemies for <color=#00FF00>{7}%</color> arrow damage.

Bouncing_Thunder.skillDesc: Firing <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> bouncing thunder every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s), deals <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage, penetrate through all enemies and randomly bounce to the next position for a total of <color=#00FF00>{8}</color> times

Radiance.skillDesc: Creating a radiation zone around oneself, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage to enemies  within a radius of <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s).

Lightning_Explose.skillDesc: Creating an electromagnetic explosion around oneself, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage within a radius of <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> after every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> units of movement.

Fire_Explose.skillDesc: Creating an explosive blast around oneself, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage within a radius of <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s) and causing enemies to burn for <color=#00FF00>{7}%</color> of the explosion's damage over <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> second(s).

Toxic_Explose.skillDesc: Creating a toxic explosion around oneself, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage within a radius of <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s) poisoning enemies for <color=#00FF00>{7}%</color> of the explosion's damage over <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> second(s).

Meteor.skillDesc: Calling down <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> meteorites to random ground positions every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s) while standing still, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage to enemies within a radius of <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> at the impact location.

Lightning_Strike.skillDesc: Calling down <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> lightning bolts to the enemy's position every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s), dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage to enemies within a radius of <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> at the location.

Rotate_Saw_Blade.skillDesc: Summoning a chainsaw spinning around oneself for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> seconds every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> seconds while standing still, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage, with a maximum of <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> chainsaws.

Rotate_Lightning_Ball.skillDesc: Summoning a lightning sphere spinning around oneself for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> seconds every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> seconds while standing still, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage within a radius of <color=#00FF00>{9}</color> every <color=#00FF00>{6}</color> seconds, with a maximum of <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> spheres.

Groundfire.skillDesc: Whenever an enemy is killed, there is a <color=#00FF00>{0}%</color> chance to summon <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> random pillars of fire from the ground, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage and burning enemies for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color>  seconds, causes <color=#00FF00>{7}%</color> of the initial damage every <color=#00FF00>{6}</color> second.

Static_Saw.skillDesc: Whenever an enemy is killed, there is a <color=#00FF00>{0}%</color> chance to summon a rotating chainsaw at a random position for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> seconds, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage.

Static_Lightning_Ball.skillDesc: Whenever an enemy is killed, there is a <color=#00FF00>{0}%</color> chance to summon a lightning orb at a random position for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> seconds, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage to enemies within a <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> radius every <color=#00FF00>{6}</color> seconds.

Flame_Orb.skillDesc: Whenever an enemy is killed, there is a <color=#00FF00>{0}%</color> chance to summon a flame orb at a random position for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> seconds, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage to enemies within a <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> radius every <color=#00FF00>{6}</color> seconds.

Light_Gun_Drone.skillDesc: Utilizing a combat-support drone that fires <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> light bullets, each dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> seconds.

Rocket_Drone.skillDesc: Utilizing a combat-support drone that fires <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> rocket bullets, each dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage within a <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> radius every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> seconds.

Flame_Trail.skillDesc: Creating a burning area beneath the feet after every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> of distance traveled, where the flames persist for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> seconds and deal <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color>damage to enemies every <color=#00FF00>{6}</color> seconds.

Ground_Stamp.skillDesc: Performing a powerful stomp on the ground, causing an explosion within a <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> radius, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage to enemies for every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> of distance traveled.

Magic_Burst.skillDesc: Creating a barrage of <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> homing magic arrows that chase the enemy for every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> of distance traveled. Each arrow deals <color=#00FF00>{1}</color> damage upon impact.

Immune_Shield.skillDesc: Creating a shield that blocks all incoming damage for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> seconds, with a cooldown of <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> seconds.

Lightning_Shield.skillDesc: When hit, there is a <color=#00FF00>{0}%</color> chance to create a lightning shield that blocks damage equivalent to  <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color>  of the attack power. When the shield breaks, it releases <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> lightning bolts that deal damage equal to the amount blocked. The lightning bolts can bounce up to <color=#00FF00>{8}</color> times to other enemies.

Fire_Shield.skillDesc: When hit, there is a <color=#00FF00>{0}%</color> chance to create a fire shield that blocks  damage equivalent to <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> of the attack power. When the shield breaks, it generates a wave of fire that spreads within a <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> radius, dealing damage equal to the amount blocked.

Moonlight_Gyro.skillDesc: Fires <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> penetrating moonlight bullets every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s) dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage,  damge reduce to <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> each time passes through.

Holy_Light.skillDesc: Every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s), summon a divine beam that heals the player for an amount of HP equal to <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> of attack.

Toxic_Swamp.skillDesc: Killing an enemy has a <color=#00FF00>{0}%</color> chance to summon a toxic swamp with <color=#00FF00>{4}</color> radius at a random location that lasts for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> seconds. It deals <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage to enemies standing on it every <color=#00FF00>{6}</color> seconds.

Acid_Rain.skillDesc: Summon an acid rain when equipped with this skill. All visible enemies receive <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage every <color=#00FF00>{6}</color> seconds

Venom_Shot.skillDesc: Fires <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> explosing venom bullets every <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> second(s) dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage, the explosion cause <color=#00FF00>{2}</color> of bullet damage whithin a radius of <color=#00FF00>{9}</color>

Plague_Ward.skillDesc: Killing an enemy has a <color=#00FF00>{0}%</color> chance to summon an immobile creature that lasts for <color=#00FF00>{5}</color> seconds, firing shots at the enemy, dealing <color=#00FF00>{1}%</color> damage every <color=#00FF00>{6}</color> seconds.
